Description: Green jasper human-headed heart-scarab; nine lines of Hieroglyphic text on base including name of Nebankh.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): fig.44. Cf. Quirke, JEOL 37 (2002-2), 31.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 113)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
